about.description:
Ekaant means 'solitude' in Sanskrit. Our vision is to provide a peaceful escape where you can reconnect with nature and yourself. We believe in sustainable living, mindful travel, and authentic rural experiences.

At Ekaant, you'll experience nature's rhythm, traditional hospitality, and the thrill of wildlife encounters. Our retreat caters to solo travelers seeking solitude, couples looking for romantic getaways, and families wanting to create lasting memories in nature.

We offer a unique blend of comfort and adventure, where every moment is designed to help you disconnect from the digital world and reconnect with the natural world.

location.title: HOW TO REACH EKAANT
location.description: Located near the Bor Tiger Reserve in Maharashtra, Ekaant is easily accessible by road, train, and air.

questions.question: Is The Ekaant Child-Friendly?
questions.answer: Yes, Children Love The Open Spaces, Animals, And Orchard Walks. We Also Have Kid-Safe Areas And Swings.

questions.question: Is There Mobile Network Or Internet?
questions.answer: Mobile Networks Are Patchy (Which Is A Blessing!), But We Do Provide Limited Wi-Fi For Emergencies.

questions.question: Can We Spot Tigers Or Wildlife Here?
questions.answer: Bor Tiger Reserve Is Known For Its Tiger Sightings. While We Cannot Guarantee Sightings, Safaris Can Be Arranged, And Wildlife Often Visits The Nearby Buffer Zones.

questions.question: Is Food Included In The Stay?
questions.answer: Yes, We Offer Delicious Home-Style Maharashtrian Meals Made With Locally Sourced Organic Ingredients.

questions.question: Do You Allow Pets?
questions.answer: Yes! Ekaant Is Pet-Friendly. We Just Ask That Pets Are Kept On Leash And Do Not Disturb The Wildlife.

questions.question: What Is The Best Time To Visit?
questions.answer: October To March Is Ideal, With Pleasant Weather And Clear Skies For Stargazing. Monsoon (July-Sept) Is Lush And Magical, Too.
